sentences.english: Is there any special Tenimyu you're longing for?
sentences.chinese: 是否特别期待某一部舞台剧？

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白胶片同时也模拟着舞台人生。

sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世纪，芭蕾渐渐地发展成为了一种舞台表演。

sentences.english: The stage is more beholding to love, than the life of man.
sentences.chinese: 舞台较人生受惠于恋爱者为多。

sentences.english: Her behaviour became increasingly erratic, and she was often drunk on stage.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为越来越古怪，有时在舞台上都是醉醺醺的。

sentences.english: Consecutive art space upstairs and downstairs is everyone's life stage.
sentences.chinese: 楼上楼下连贯的艺术空间，是每个人的生活舞台。

sentences.english: Don't assume, however, that Confucius has entirely left the stage.
sentences.chinese: 不要以为孔子已经完全退出了历史舞台。

sentences.english: The plan did not work and the emphasis switched from stage set to soapbox.
sentences.chinese: 计划无法发挥功效，重点就从舞台转变为街头演说台。

sentences.english: The remonstrating officials played an active social role on the political and cultural stages of the Middle Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 谏官是中唐政治和文化舞台上活跃的社会角色之一。

sentences.english: The movie star was warmly cheered as he got on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 这位影星登上舞台时受到人们的热烈欢呼。

sentences.english: It has already achieved much in this arena.
sentences.chinese: 它已经在这个舞台上实现了很多成绩。

sentences.english: Ah, the society is a large stage, so is human life a living play with one climax following another.
sentences.chinese: 呵，社会是一个大舞台，人生是一出波澜起伏的活剧。

sentences.english: They will play a stage—show , wish all the people in snow .
sentences.chinese: 他们会上演一台舞台剧，祝福所有贮立雪中的人。

sentences.english: The two-floor stage design provides a better stage view and more possiblity for performers.
sentences.chinese: 独有的双层舞台设计，更让演出拥有多样可能性。

sentences.english: However, the stage of entertainment world is cruel.
sentences.chinese: 然而演艺圈的舞台是残酷的。

definition: to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4
